description: This file defines a jQuery plugin for a crossword puzzle widget, including functions for rendering the puzzle grid, handling user interactions, checking answers, and navigating clues and entries.

classes.name: puzInit
classes.description: Initialization object containing methods to set up the crossword puzzle, calculate coordinates, build the grid, and check answers.

classes.name: nav
classes.description: Navigation helper object for moving between clues and entries, updating active positions, and handling user navigation.

classes.name: util
classes.description: Utility functions for highlighting entries and clues, managing classes, and handling active positions.

methods.name: crossword
methods.description: Main function that initializes the crossword puzzle on a jQuery element, setting up the grid, clues, and interaction handlers.
